entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
